Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a tiebreaking solo homer in the ninth inning
Aaron Ashby (1-2) pitched two scoreless innings for the win
Devin Williams worked a shaky ninth for his eighth save
Blake Perkins made a diving stop of Ty Franceâ€™s hard grounder for the final out
Noelvi Marte was robbed of a potential go-ahead homer by Blake Perkins
Post-Match Reflections: The Brewers reduced their magic number to 16 for clinching the NL Central title
Milwaukee became the third team to reach 80 wins this season
David Bell praised the Brewers' performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jackson Chourio had three hits and scored twice
Willy Adames hit a three-run drive in the third inning
Spencer Steer hit a two-run single in the fifth
Amed Rosario connected for a tying two-run homer in the sixth
Fernando Cruz made his second consecutive start as a reliever
